attributes.description: Operating pressure range for crew and passenger comfort and safety.
attributes.name: operationalPressureRange

attributes.description: Precision of the pressure monitoring system in atmospheric pressure units.
attributes.name: pressureMeasurementAccuracy

attributes.description: Rate at which air pressure can be adjusted during ascent or descent.
attributes.name: pressureAdjustmentRate

attributes.description: Emergency pressure release threshold to maintain structural safety.
attributes.name: emergencyPressureReliefThreshold

designScenario.description: The Pressurization System ensures the maintenance of a comfortable and safe cabin pressure environment for passengers and crew during all flight phases. Integrating state-of-the-art sensors and control algorithms, the system adapts to altitude fluctuations and ensures compliance with aviation regulations.
designScenario.name: Pressurization System

details.description: The system must maintain cabin pressure equivalent to an altitude of 8000 feet or lower at all cruising altitudes.
Response time for cabin pressure adjustments should not exceed 3 seconds to altitude changes.
The system includes redundant pressure relief valves to handle over-pressurization emergencies effectively.
The control interface for flight crew must be intuitive and provide real-time pressure information.

relationships.description: The control unit manages inputs from the pressure sensors and commands the pressure regulation system.
The pressure regulation unit is dependent on the air handling system to provide conditioned air for pressurization.
The pressure monitoring system integrates data from multiple sensor modules to maintain accurate readings.

systemComponents.description: The core unit responsible for centralized processing and system control.
systemComponents.name: Control Unit

subComponents.description: Displays real-time cabin pressure and status alerts to the flight crew.
subComponents.name: User Interface Panel

subComponents.description: Processes data from sensors to make adjustments.
subComponents.name: Processing Module

systemComponents.description: Monitors internal cabin and external pressure levels.
systemComponents.name: Pressure Sensors

subComponents.description: Measures ambient internal cabin pressure levels.
subComponents.name: Cabin Pressure Sensor

subComponents.description: Detects external atmospheric pressure for altitude reference.
subComponents.name: External Pressure Sensor

systemComponents.description: Manages the inflow and outflow of air for pressurization adjustments.
systemComponents.name: Pressure Regulation Unit

subComponents.description: Air intake valve controlling the amount of air entering the cabin.
subComponents.name: Intake Valve

systemComponents.description: Collects data from distributed sensors for analysis.
systemComponents.name: Pressure Monitoring System

rag_context: Pressurization System的所有信息和规格说明包括操作压力范围、响应时间、传感器精度和操作温度范围。
